abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (i)
            reconstruction of the 19 km Puente Camu-San Francisco de
            Macoris Road; (ii) rehabilitation, widening or
            reconstruction of bridges on the Puente Camu-San Francisco
            de Macoris Road; (iii) purchase of highway maintenance
            equipment, workshop tools and equipment; (iv) purchase of
            spare parts; (v) rehabilitation and reconstruction of
            workshops; (vi) improvement of maintenance procedures and
            planning; (vii) supervision of the reconstruction of the
            Puente Camu-San Francisco de Macoris Road; and (viii)
            technical assistance to implement the maintenance program.
